Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    The class ClientHandler handles the connection, the pings and the communication with a client
    Controller
    The abstract class Controller manages all actions performed on a game by the clients and creates the game related messages that will be sent to them
    Lobby
    The Lobby class is a singleton that manages the creation of new ClientHandlers, new Controllers and new Games.
    NewGameController
    The NewGameController class is the concrete implementation of the abstract class Controller for the newly created games
    RestoredGameController
    The RestoredGameController class is the concrete implementation of the abstract class Controller for the previously saved games restored from file
    SavedGameManager
    The SavedGameManager class contains all static methods needed to save and restore games
    Server
    The class Server listens to the port given as argument and creates new sockets for the clients that connect to it
